snippet: Mr. Osberg will be replaced by the current chief operating officer, Robert J. Hall, who will become publisher and chief executive of the Philadelphia Media Network, which owns the newspapers.
abstract: Mr. Osberg will be replaced by the current chief operating officer, Robert J. Hall, who will become publisher and chief executive of the Philadelphia Media Network, which owns the newspapers.

headline.main: Gregory Osberg, Chief Executive of Philadelphia Inquirer and Daily News, Is Out
